== Layouts ==
Tile   		       : [tiled]      : Master on left, slaves on right
B-stack		       : [b-stack]    : Master on top, slaves on bottom
Spiral 		       : [fibonacci]  : Fibonacci spiral
Dwindle		       : [dwindle]    : Decreasing in size right and leftward
Deck   		       : [deck]       : Master on left, slaves in monocle-eque mode on right
Monocle                : [monocle]    : All windows on top of eachother
Center master 	       : [c-master]   : Master in middle, slaves on sides
Center master floating : [c-f-master] : Same but master floats
